chapter.title: Introduction to Python
chapter.summary: What is Python and why should you learn it?

section.paragraph: Python is a simple and powerful programming language.
It is used for web development, data science, and more.
Python is easy to read and write.

chapter.title: Your First Program
chapter.summary: Writing and running your first Python code.

section.paragraph: Open your text editor and type: print Hello World.
Save the file and run it to see your first output.

chapter.title: Variables
chapter.summary: How to store information in your programs.

section.paragraph: Variables are like boxes that hold data.
You can store numbers, text, and other values in them.

chapter.title: A New Day

section.paragraph: Ahmed woke up early on a sunny morning.
